flawed_nl_solution:
She gets 1000/25=<<1000/25=40>>40 sections
She gives away 40/4=<<40/4=10>>10 sections
So she keeps 40-10=<<40-10=28>>28 sections
She keeps 28/2=<<28/2=14>>14 sections on hand
#### 14

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 28. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
